price: Kuma Allah Yã saukar da ruwa daga sama, sa'an nan Ya rãyar da ƙasa da shi a bãyan mutuwarta. Lalle ne a cikin wannan haƙĩƙa akwai ãyã ga mutãne waɗanda suke saurãre.
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَأَحۡيَا بِهِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَآۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu anzala mina al-samāi māan fa-aḥyā bihi al-arḍa baʿda mawtihā inna fī dhālika laāyatan liqawmin yasmaʿūna
